mapper.select: select aply.goods_no, aply.item_no, ci.prm_no, ci.prm_nm, ci.dc_ccd, ci.dc_val, ci.min_pur_amt, ci.max_dc_amt, iss.cpn_iss_no, case when ci.prm_priod_ccd = '10' or ci.prm_kind_cd = '10' then ci.prm_end_dt else iss.sys_mod_dtime + ci.prm_std_dd * interval '1 day' end prm_end_dt from cup_info ci inner join aply on ci.prm_no = aply.prm_no left join cc_cpn_issue iss on aply.prm_no = iss.prm_no and iss.mbr_no = #{mbrNo} where 1 = 1 and now() < ci.prm_end_dt and ci.prm_kind_cd = #{prmKindCd} and ci.min_pur_amt < aply.orr_at and ci.cpn_kind_cd = #{cpnKindCd} and iss.cpn_use_dt is null
